column1: Art Institute of Chicago////World class art museum!  A must-see
column2: in my opinion.  I'd highly recommend buying tickets on-line in advance to avoid some long lines on busy days.  This saved us 15-20 minutes.  We were fortunate enough to visit while the Andy Warhol exhibit was being featured
column4: but I'm confident that everything they feature would be worthy of your time and money.  We spent 4-5 hours and barely scratched the surface.  Don't miss the impressionist exhibit.  It's an impressive impressionist display
column5: if I do say so myself.  The cafe and gift shop are both awesome
